string.value: A foul odor has been reported in Nautilus. People say it's Tangyoon trying to cook up some strange dish like he did two years ago. Head there and investigate.
You learned that Tangyoon is cooking up a secret entrÃ©e. Find him #b50 Ligator Skins
A foul odor has been reported in Nautilus. People say it's Tangyoon trying to cook up some strange dish like he did two years ago.

I knew if I stayed here too long my genius would go to waste! Seriously, a great chef like me needs inspiration! But nooo, all these seamen want are simple meals that are beneath someone of my expertise!
For two years now I've put up with this! No more! I'm working on a secret dish to blow the socks off of these people. And you know what? You're going to help me.

This secret dish I'm working on is rather complicated. And no, I can't tell you what it is. Then it wouldn't be a secret, right? But I will tell you this much. The main ingredient is #bLigator Skin.#k Yup, I said#b Ligator Skin.#k Could you grab me #b50 Ligator Skins#k?
You don't want to be part of culinary history? Fine. There are other fish in the sea.
